      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void alternateTurn()
      Alternate turn between player, set active player based on turn and initiate player's clock add time of 2 second to the clock when player finish a move Unable the current player of its turn and enable the player of next turn as the active player Stop the timer for player whose turn isn't in the current turn.

      • isLegalMove

        public boolean isLegalMove(Piece piece,
                           Cell destination)
        Evaluate if a move is legal by simulating if a piece move there and get the state of the board If a piece of x color attempt this move to/capture destination and result in x in check it is considered an illegal move
        Parameters:
        piece - piece about to move
        destination - cell it's about to move to
        Returns:
        boolean true if the move is legal and false otherwise

      • movement

        public boolean movement(Piece piece,
                        Cell destination)
        Method for piece movement, if it is a capture, call capture then change position of piece and kill the target
        Parameters:
        piece - Piece to move
        destination - Cell to move to
        Returns:
        true if movement success and false otherwise

      • isCastlingLegal

        public boolean isCastlingLegal(boolean bool)
        Check if castling is legal by simulating if the castling is done to see if the game in check or not
        Parameters:
        bool - true for castling to the Rook on the far side of the King, false for the Rook on the close side
        Returns:
        boolean: true if it is legal to castling as per input, false for otherwise

      • castling

        public boolean castling(boolean bool)
        Method for commence the castling
        Parameters:
        bool - for castling to the Rook at the far side of the King, false for the closer side Rook
        Returns:
        boolean: true if castling as per input has been done, false otherwise

      • alternateTurn

        public void alternateTurn()
        Alternate turn between player, set active player based on turn and initiate player's clock add time of 2 second to the clock when player finish a move Unable the current player of its turn and enable the player of next turn as the active player Stop the timer for player whose turn isn't in the current turn.
